name: Steps 4 Smile
description:
Your mission is to help the little "Joker" Dinosaur to grab all the Smiles. 

Beware of gravity and remember to smile!

_______________________________________________

This is the first project I developed by myself, from coding to assets.

I submitted it to the Weekend Jam!#1 (https://itch.io/jam/weekend-jam-1).

As first game, I tried to keep it very simple.

Any feedback is welcome.
